title: Research scenario set stress study - application

content.question: Ralph participated in Dr. Salimâ€™s study. In addition to taking several advanced courses, Ralph has a part-time job, relationship challenges, and an unpredictable home life. Which of the following might Ralph experience as a long-term result of these stressors?

choices.label: Increased ability to focus on multiple tasks

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
